System requirements: 
- 64-bit version of Microsoft Windows 10 (desktop OS), Windows 8.1 with the KB2919355 update, Windows 7 SP1 
- 64-bit (x64) processor with 1 GHz or higher 
- 4 GB of RAM (recommended 8 GB) 
- Video card with a resolution of 1360x768 (recommended 1600x1050 or higher ), which provides mode full color palette (True The the Color) 
- recommended scaling workspace 125% (120 dpi) or less 
- 8 GB of free disk space for installation 

Description : of AutoCAD Plant 3D is used for the design of process equipment, piping and instrumentation industry, and and to release the documentation. Available technical Designers -. 
The ability to create the most modern 3D-projects in a familiar environment AutoCAD design capabilities based on technical requirements and the library of standard components allow you to optimize the process piping design and layout, production equipment and support elements. 
Built-in AutoCAD P & ID let you create and edit piping and instrumentation circuits, and then align the data with the 3D-model. On based on 3D-models can create isometric drawings and orthogonal views. AutoCAD Plant 3D is part of the software package Autodesk Plant Design Suite.

functionality
Tight integration with Vault
Automatic routing of pipelines
Parametric modeling equipment
Modelling of building structures
The calculation of weight and center of gravity
Simulation piping fixed length
Data Validation P & ID
Two-dimensional and isometric piping drawings
Import Inventor equipment models
specification
